about_the_game:
After Midnight is an open-world, online multiplayer ghost hunting game that plunges you into a vast and eerie world filled with haunted locations waiting to be discovered. Whether you're braving the darkness alone or teaming up with friends, your mission is to explore this chilling world, uncover its secrets, and identify the terrifying entities lurking within.

During early access, there will be frequent discounts on the game. Once it is fully released, discounts will be less common. Additionally, the game will see more gameplay mechanics, maps, items, VR support, and controller features integrated. After Midnight is expected to be fully released by the end of 2024 or early 2025. Players can join the Discord to communicate directly with the developers and suggest features or mechanics for future updates. This is a pre-release version, and while we expect bugs and crashes, they are being addressed weekly. Purchasing early access grants you all future updates for free, and the game is not pay-to-win.

We are a strong small team that looks forward to revolutionizing the ghost hunting genre of games.

Travel freely across a variety of haunted environments, from abandoned asylums to cursed houses, each location unlocked as you delve deeper into the mystery. Use your wits, specialized tools, and teamwork to gather evidence and uncover the truth behind each haunting. Will you unravel the mystery and survive the night, or will the unknown forces claim you as their next victim?

Key Features:

Open World Exploration: Navigate a vast, interconnected world filled with haunted locations to discover and unlock as you progress.

Co-op Multiplayer: Team up with friends in a four-player cooperative experience, or take on the spirits solo if you dare. Up to 4 players.

Immersive Horror: Feel the tension build with every creaking floorboard and whispered voice as you navigate terrifying environments.

Detective Gameplay: Use tools like EMF readers, spirit boxes, and thermal cameras to gather evidence and identify the entity haunting each location. Up to 37 types of Creatures to Discover.

Dynamic AI: Encounter unpredictable spirits with different behaviors and abilities, making each investigation a unique experience.

Replayability: Procedurally generated hauntings and randomized objectives ensure that no two investigations are ever the same.

Prepare yourself for the ultimate ghost-hunting adventure in After Midnight. Will you uncover the truth, or will you become another lost soul in the darkness?

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

After Midnight contains mature content that may not be suitable for all players. Below is a detailed description of the content featured in the game:

Violence: The game includes intense and graphic depictions of violence. Players may encounter scenes with blood, gore, and physical combat, including confrontations with both human and non-human enemies. These scenarios may portray injury and death in a realistic manner.

Sexual Content: The game contains sexual themes and imagery, including depictions of ghosts or demons in various states of undress.

Drug and Alcohol Use: There are representations of drug and alcohol use within the game. This may involve characters consuming alcohol or using drugs as a means to cope with fear.

Self-Harm and Mental Health: The game explores themes of self-harm and mental health struggles. Players may encounter content related to the backstory of the ghosts or demons, including issues such as depression, suicide, and revenge, which may be addressed in future updates.

Sensitive Topics: The storyline includes mature and potentially triggering themes such as abuse and trauma. These topics are integral to the plot and are portrayed realistically to reflect the behaviors and experiences of the characters based on their pasts.

We advise players to consider their personal sensitivities before engaging with the game. If you have concerns about specific content or how it is portrayed, please review the game’s detailed content warnings or reach out to us for more information.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2400G, Ryzen 5 3500, Ryzen 5 4500, Ryzen 5 1600X, i5-9400F, i3-9350KF, i5-7600, i3-12100.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 max 720-1080p resolution Maximum 30 FPS
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: In future Update we will enable VR (END 2024 - EARLY 2025)
  • Additional Notes: Please note that with the minimum system requirements, the game is expected to run at a maximum of 30 FPS. The game leverages Nanite and Lumen technologies to deliver an exceptionally high-quality visual experience. Not recomended to be hosting a game with minimum specs (but it can barely at Early Access Game)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 11th generation, or an Intel i7 10th generation or higher. AMD 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 / RX 6900 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: In future Update we will enable VR (END 2024 - EARLY 2025)
  • Additional Notes: For smooth frame rates and cinematic visuals, you may require hardware that exceeds the recommended specifications at 4k Resolution Monitor. Or Dual monitors.
